reviews.review: Still the best game I've ever had.

Я ебал все время проведенное в этой анальной боли . Все гребаные пол тары тысячи часов.Меня эта игра свела с ума . Я не могу в нее не играть Просираю каждый день по 5 часов в этом говне и вливаю туда дохуя бабла. А если коротко советую всем эту прекрасную игру
Jogo bom, gosto muito de jogar pela gamers club e faceit, pois o jogo em si pela valve de fato tem muito cheater e o anti-cheater da valve não é bom, infelizmente.
great graphics and lots of fun, this game is probably one of valves best games and is the best counter strike game ever
its an  incredible  game for the community!
10/10 reached global elite in 2 hours ez
Best way to lose the time
One of the greatest shooters ever
This game sucks eggs, what are you going to do about huh Gaben?
Porque hoy me levante re locooooo
Takım olup arkadaşlarınızla oynucağınız efsane olmuş bir oyun fakaaaaaatt hile oynayan çok insan var o yüzden bu oyunu almayın aldırtmayıın !

i absoloutely have a love hate relationship with this game
i hate this game so much , alot of hackers and BS kills but for some reason i keep coming back to it
you never get what you want from a crate but hey what game with crates do you get what you want 
i bought it back when it was a 15 dollar game and was kinda salty when they made it free but hey if you want a game that you will wish you never installed and at the same time always come back for more this is definitely the game for you
i will say you will scream, feel like throwing your keyboard and mouse at a wall, feel like punching your moniter (which i strongly suggest against)  but overall this game is pretty damn fun on offical servers and the community servers are HELLA TOXIC but trust me this game is definitely one to play given it is free now.
The surf servers are the only thing I enjoy tbh
O jogo é bom, mas comprem o prime, bem melhor
buen juego, se merece lo mejor
Lots of fun stiil after all these years
我都被误封了 我还推荐个P
"Dude, I swear I hit him like 10 times!!"

fun game, played it a bit, much better with friends but not necessary

pro tip, just because they are better than you doesn't make them a cheater. though they probable are cheating anyways

better pro tip, don't open cases
If you still don't have this there is a problem

Залупа а не игра,знаю,выглядит деструктивно,но это лишь на первый взгляд.Игра не предлагает тебе взамен ничего в альтернативу той серости,которая нас окружает в жизни,вы встретитесь с токсичным комьюнити,в виде малазийцев,китайцев,корейцев,да кого угодно без разницы,но всех их объединяет то,что вы не сможете найти с ними общий язык и достойно сыграть в команде . В совокупе с читерами ,ужасными механиками,начиная от стрельбы,заканчивая геймплеем вы получите незабываемый улёт в виде сгоревших понапрасну нервов сил и взамен никакого сука отдыха,оценка , 2,5/10
Poderia ter continuado pago, mas ainda é o melhor fps da história.
我世界第一狙击手，simple 见了要喊师傅
If you meet a russian, tell him "suka blyat"
Ахуенная игра. Рот болит и попе больно в CS GO играть прикольно!!!

Es simplemente una joya, está demasiado bien hecho, tantas mecánicas, tantas cosas que puedes aplicarle al juego, es simplemente increíble, el único problema serían los hackers y los tóxicos (pero lo de los hackers está casi solucionado). Eso, bien hecho valve, ahora toca darle soporte al tf2.
